title: Directory Traversal in File Download
description: The file download functionality at /download.php is vulnerable to directory traversal attacks. An attacker can access arbitrary files on the server by manipulating the file parameter.
steps_to_reproduce:
1. Navigate to https://vulnerable-app.com/download.php
2. Modify the file parameter to: ../../../etc/passwd
3. Send the request: https://vulnerable-app.com/download.php?file=../../../etc/passwd
4. The server will return the contents of /etc/passwd
